resources.string: This window will show activity charts of your movement at night. Every chart record that is at least one hour-long will be listed here.

This window shows the history of your body movements during the sleep. Smart Alarm Clock calculates your sleep stages and the optimal moment of awakening based on these movements.\n\nPlease upload your movements history and ratings - those anonymous statistics will help us to improve the application to make your awakening even better!
Uploading the history to the server
All records will be completely deleted from the phone
The database has been scheduled for deletion
Failed to write movements data to SD card
